name: Tattle Tale - demo!
description:
Tattle Tale is the story of a wingless crow learning about empathy (and skateboarding) while helping a tailless raccoon, who owns a dumpster turned diner, get revenge! With the power of caffeine and cool glasses, together we can save... the day? Our ego? We'll save something, that's for sure! Or break something - the 2nd option is the more likely scenario.

Anyway!

D Pad (arrow keys) to move around

A (cntrl/z) Jump/interact

.

B (alt/x) Think about how cool you are

Select (shift) check for evidence of personal coolness

.

Start (enter) Go To Start

.

Good luck and have fun!

.

.

Thanks to all my friends for encouraging me and listening to my delightful, Neverending nonsense (especially Omega & Numbers). Thanks to peik for talking music and my family for putting up with me

<3

I love you all, so very much

<3
